sentences.en: After plundering enough pelf, he took a train bound for the border.
sentences.cn: 在抢得足够的钱财后，他乘上开往边境的火车。

sentences.en: After plundering enough pelf, he took a train bound for the border.
sentences.cn: 在抢了足够的财物之后，他乘上了去往边境的火车。

sentences.en: Let him disenslave himself from the pelf of the world.
sentences.cn: 让他从金钱束缚下解放自己.

sentences.en: Other households had found her too talkative and too opinionated, forever giving pelf mysterious airs.
sentences.cn: 在别处,有人嫌她太张道, 主意多,时常有些神眉鬼道儿的.

trans.tran_en: money or wealth, esp if dishonestly acquired; lucre
